title: Recovering an alternate account

embed.description: If you're having issues remembering your username, you can recover them by following the steps below. You should note that there is a difference between your Summoner name and your username. Your u...

body: I just started playing with a new group of friends and since they are dragged into completely the wrong mmr. I was wondering if anyone could help me by suggesting a way to find my account info, with only the summoner name, not the username or password. It would be a lot easier than starting a new account from scratch, is there any way to? this site suggests ways if you know only your username or email, which I know neither of. Thanks!

replies.body: You've taken the right step by trying the support guide to locate your account.  Reach out to us in an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will take a look.  It'll be a bit due to current volume in the queue, but we'll help out asap!
